data.title: Distance from Sharjah to Chittagong (SHJ – CGP)
data.meta_description: Distance from Sharjah to Chittagong (Sharjah International Airport – Shah Amanat International Airport) is 2301 miles / 3704 kilometers / 2000 nautical miles. See also a map, estimated flight duration, carbon dioxide emissions and the time difference between Sharjah and Chittagong.
data.text:
Distance from Sharjah to Chittagong

There are several ways to calculate the distance from Sharjah to Chittagong. Here are two standard methods:

Vincenty's formula (applied above)

2301.435 miles

3703.801 kilometers

1999.892 nautical miles

Vincenty's formula calculates the distance between latitude/longitude points on the earth's surface using an ellipsoidal model of the planet.

Haversine formula

2297.721 miles

3697.824 kilometers

1996.665 nautical miles
